channel.title: Some vps problems!
channel.description: Hello! I just recently bought a linux vps and i want to host my rsps on it, but the problems persist and i cant solve em.If someone who knows how to set it up please help me with it :). The main thing is this one is only core versioon in ohter words it does not have "desktop" or any graphical gui at all.VPS is linux ubuntu 13.04 x64 bit based. I bought it from softsyshosting.com if that means anything.

item.title: Some vps problems!
item.dc:creator: @5oulreaper 5oulreaper
item.description:
@5oulreaper wrote:

Hello!
I just recently bought a linux vps and i want to host my rsps on it, but the problems persist and i cant solve em.If someone who knows how to set it up please help me with it :). The main thing is this one is only core versioon in ohter words it does not have “desktop” or any graphical gui at all.VPS is linux ubuntu 13.04 x64 bit based. I bought it from softsyshosting.com if that means anything.

Read full topic
